# cook your dish here
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    count = 1
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(n):
            x = bin(count)[2:]
            x = x[::-1]
            print( x , end=" ")
            count += 1
        print()

def f(n):
    p = 1 
    i = 1
    while i<=n:
        j = 1
        while j<= n:
            print((str(bin(p))[2:])[::-1], "", end="")
            p += 1
            j += 1
        print()
        i += 1

t = int(input())
answers = list()
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    answers.append(n)

for answer in answers:
    f(answer)
